--- Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:

> OOC: I should have checked in earlier... Sorry about all the details
> not being covered. Basically, I wanted to reintroduce an old
> character
> and have a go at the Minions. Preston, to help you out, Vorpal was
> deliberately not fleshed out. He's a military Genius and a tyrant,
> but
> little else is known. That's what makes him scary.

OOC: Then I will maintain that secrecy. I will use the trio of minions
I sent A-blade's way for the moment, if that's okay with all. I would
think that a battle directly with Vorpal would need some details for
him if Azureblade is as powerful as he seems? I will be posting
hopefully tommorrow, and always I am open to comments.

Preston
(Da'minion)
